data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What is the last book that you read more than once? What made you to want to read it again?
data.answer: On writing, a memoir of the craft is a book written by Stephen King. One quote from this book is "I am writing the first draft of this part at my desk on a snowy morning in December of 1997.” The first time when I read the quote, it touched my heart on a very deep level. Perhaps, it was because of his sincerity. I read this book more than one time because of Stephen King’s belief. It provides me with spiritual support. Stephen King believes that writing is a lonely job and having someone who believes in him makes a lot of differences. Writings are speechless, but believers of words would always get connected to the literature.
